callout_info_tooltip: This callout is used for general notes.
callout_success_tooltip: This callout is used for tips and useful information.
callout_warning_tooltip: This callout is used for important information.
callout_error_tooltip: This callout is used for critical information and prohibitions.
callout_commentary_tooltip: This callout is used for developer commentary.

callout_source_tooltip: This alert is used for direct commentary of the author.

page_branding_description: The assets used across our brand, as well as their usage guidelines.
page_branding_section_typography_descrip: The fonts used across our brand.
page_branding_section_typography_paragra: This section covers approved typefaces, and some helpful usage tips.
Any typeface not referenced in this section is considered unauthorized for use.
page_blog_description: Read our latest blog posts and project updates.
home_hero_description: The definitive guide to all things queer.
home_projects_description: Exploring the breadth of queer identity and history.
home_music_description: Queer-authored soundtracks and immersive audio experiences.
home_cta_description: Join us on our journey to document the extraordinary.
home_feature_game_developer_desc: Connecting queer individuals with the information they need to thrive.
home_feature_web_developer_desc: Building tools and resources to empower our community.
home_feature_narrative_writer_desc: Preserving the stories and milestones of the LGBTQ+ movement.
home_feature_dj_desc: Amplifying queer voices through music and spoken word.
home_feature_guitarist_desc: Highlighting queer artists and their contributions to the world.
home_feature_pianist_desc: Fostering safe spaces and resources for mental and physical wellness.
about_hero_description: We are a collective of researchers, creators, and advocates building the next generation of queer knowledge.
about_mission_description: To provide accurate, inclusive, and empowering resources for the LGBTQ+ community.
about_join_us_description: Be a part of something extraordinary.
careers_hero_description: Join us in crafting the future of queer knowledge.
careers_culture_description: We foster a culture of inclusivity, collaboration, and continuous learning.
careers_benefits_health_desc: Access to community-vetted mental and physical health guides.
careers_benefits_time_desc: Contribute as much or as little as you want, on your own schedule.
careers_benefits_development_desc: Learn about research, moderation, and community management.
careers_benefits_gear_desc: Access to our internal tools and platforms to help you build.
careers_no_positions: No open roles at the moment. Check back later!
